Welcome!

I study behavior modeling and planning in urban spaces, using techniques from various fields such as choice modeling, game theory, traffic flow theory, and machine learning.
Currently, I am working toward the Ph.D. degree in the Department of Civil Engineering at the University of Tokyo, Japan.

masuda[at]bin.t.u-tokyo.ac.jp

News

  • 2025-12-9 Presentation at HKSTS 2025 in Hong Kong, titled 'Estimating Behavioral Urban Dynamics under Strategic Interaction: A Game-Theoretic Approach to Transport and Development Policy.'
  • 2025-11-19 Presentation at IEEE ITSC 2025 in Gold Coast, Australia, titled 'Predictive Traffic Control for Evacuation Contraflow using ZDD Sampling.'
